Articles.Content:
Hey, everyone! As always, a noob is incoming! I stumbled across the game from a KurtJmac video (youtube person, plays minecraft and other games.)! I watched all his videos then knew I had to get the game. I\'m a bit of a space person myself, even have a poster of some of the planets and a rocket launching.

Haven\'t really played that many space games in my time, but I bet Kerbal will be the best. I already bought the game, and messed around with a few of the rocket designs. I tried to go to the launch platform thing, only to have my game lag out.

I\'ve tried to tweak all the settings to down to the lowest setting - but still seem to lag. Is there a mod out there that would help me deal with this lag?

I\'ve been looking around on the forums, and found that this place seems to have a pretty nice community! I\'m glad for that, and hope this game will be extra successful.

Anyways, Deanol signing off. Take care everyone!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

It would be best if you reposted the game issues you are experiencing in the support forum, your question is more likely to get an answer there.

Welcome to the forums!

Welcome Deanol

If you file any bug reports, look here first.
